channel.title: I need help decreasing my Korasi sword ability!
channel.description:
Ok so heres my korasi code.
[code=java]item = 19784 Korasi's_sword The_sword_of_a_Void_Knight. 0 0 0 60 70 -2 0 0 0 1 0 0 0 70 0[/code]
And the special dosn't drain it stays at 100% can someone help me fix these?
My korasi hits 99's and 1 hit Jad LOL
